markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Summon Air Elemental](/Feats.aspx?ID=2602) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Sylph" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=311" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 115 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You have a connection to the Inner Spheres, allowing you to summon an elemental ally. Once per day, you can cast [_summon elemental_](/Spells.aspx?ID=320) as a 5th-level primal innate spell, but the elemental summoned must be an [air elemental](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=41).
name: Summon Air Elemental
